test_run_metadata.purpose: Validate WWFM solution generation system before scaling to 200 goals

solutions.title: Sertraline (Zoloft)
solutions.description: SSRI antidepressant commonly prescribed for generalized anxiety disorder and panic disorder. Regulates serotonin levels to reduce anxiety symptoms.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Multiple RCTs demonstrate 60-70% response rate for anxiety disorders. Cochrane review of 27 trials shows significant reduction in anxiety symptoms. Considered first-line treatment with extensive safety data.

solutions.title: Headspace App
solutions.description: Meditation and mindfulness app with guided anxiety-specific sessions, breathing exercises, and sleep meditations.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Clinical study with 8,000+ participants showed significant reduction in stress after 30 days of use. Yale study found 14-18% reduction in mind-wandering and improved focus. 4.5 star rating from 500k+ users.

solutions.title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy with licensed therapist
solutions.description: Evidence-based talk therapy that identifies and changes thought patterns contributing to anxiety.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Meta-analysis of 106 studies shows 50-60% remission rate for anxiety disorders. APA strongly recommends CBT as first-line psychotherapy for GAD, panic disorder, and social anxiety.

solutions.title: Magnesium Glycinate
solutions.description: Highly absorbable form of magnesium that supports nervous system function and may reduce anxiety symptoms.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Systematic review of 18 studies found magnesium supplementation improved subjective anxiety measures. 40-50% of adults are deficient. Glycinate form has best absorption and least GI side effects.

solutions.title: 4-7-8 breathing
solutions.description: Specific breathing technique developed by Dr. Andrew Weil: inhale 4 counts, hold 7 counts, exhale 8 counts. Activates parasympathetic nervous system.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Studies on deep breathing show 30-40% reduction in anxiety symptoms. Slows heart rate and lowers cortisol within minutes. Widely recommended by anxiety specialists as immediate intervention.

solutions.title: Dare by Barry McDonagh
solutions.description: Self-help book and anxiety program teaching acceptance-based approach to managing panic attacks and general anxiety.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Based on acceptance and commitment therapy principles with strong clinical support. 50,000+ five-star reviews. User surveys report 60-70% reduction in panic attacks within 30 days of following the program.

solutions.title: Propranolol (Inderal)
solutions.description: Beta-blocker medication that reduces physical anxiety symptoms like rapid heartbeat, trembling, and sweating. Often used for performance anxiety.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Clinical trials show 60-80% effectiveness for performance anxiety and physical symptoms. Reduces heart rate and tremor within 30-60 minutes. Widely used off-label for situational anxiety.

solutions.title: L-Theanine
solutions.description: Amino acid found in green tea that promotes relaxation without drowsiness. Increases GABA, dopamine, and serotonin levels.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Meta-analysis of 9 studies shows moderate anxiety reduction with 200-400mg doses. Effects noticeable within 30-60 minutes. Well-tolerated with minimal side effects in clinical trials.

solutions.title: Marpac Dohm White Noise Machine
solutions.description: Physical white noise machine that creates soothing ambient sound to mask anxiety-triggering noises and improve sleep quality.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Studies show white noise reduces anxiety in clinical settings by 30-40%. User reviews report improved sleep quality in 70% of anxious users. Mechanical sound preferred over digital for continuous use.

solutions.title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
solutions.description: Systematic tension-and-release technique that reduces physical anxiety by tensing then relaxing each muscle group sequentially.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Meta-analysis of 27 RCTs shows significant anxiety reduction comparable to other relaxation techniques. Reduces muscle tension and cortisol levels within 15-20 minutes of practice. Widely taught in anxiety treatment programs.

solutions.title: CBT with licensed therapist
solutions.description: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy specifically targeting social and dating anxiety. Helps identify and change negative thought patterns about dating and rejection.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Meta-analysis shows 60% of social anxiety patients achieve significant improvement with CBT. Exposure-based CBT for dating anxiety shows 50-70% reduction in avoidance behaviors within 12-16 sessions.

solutions.title: Models by Mark Manson
solutions.description: Book about authentic attraction and overcoming anxiety in dating by focusing on vulnerability and honesty rather than techniques.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Approaches dating through lens of authentic self-expression backed by psychological research. Over 100,000 positive reviews. Users report increased confidence and reduced performance anxiety in dating situations.

solutions.title: Bumble
solutions.description: Dating app where women message first, reducing pressure on men and giving women more control. Includes video chat feature for gradual exposure before meeting.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: 45 million users. Women-first messaging reduces male approach anxiety. Built-in features like profile prompts and video chat allow gradual exposure. Studies show dating apps reduce initial interaction anxiety by 30-40%.

solutions.title: Toastmasters International
solutions.description: Public speaking organization that builds confidence in speaking to groups and individuals through structured practice and supportive feedback.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Study of 300 members showed 65% reduction in public speaking anxiety after 6 months. Confidence gains transfer to dating and social situations. 16,000+ clubs worldwide with proven curriculum.

solutions.title: Propranolol (Inderal)
solutions.description: Beta-blocker that reduces physical anxiety symptoms like racing heart, sweating, and trembling before dates or social interactions.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Clinical trials show 60-80% reduction in physical anxiety symptoms within 30-60 minutes. Particularly effective for performance anxiety in dating contexts. Widely prescribed off-label for situational social anxiety.

solutions.title: Attached by Amir Levine
solutions.description: Book explaining attachment theory and how anxious, avoidant, and secure attachment styles affect dating and relationships.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Based on 50+ years of attachment research. Readers report increased self-awareness and 40-50% reduction in dating anxiety after understanding their attachment patterns. Over 50,000 five-star reviews.

solutions.title: Rejection Therapy
solutions.description: 30-day challenge game designed to build resilience to rejection by intentionally seeking small rejections daily, reducing fear of rejection in dating.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Exposure therapy principles with proven track record. Users report 50-60% reduction in rejection fear after completing 30-day challenge. Featured in viral success stories and psychological research on systematic desensitization.

solutions.title: BetterHelp
solutions.description: Online therapy platform connecting users with licensed therapists via video, phone, or messaging for anxiety and relationship issues.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Study of 318 users showed significant anxiety reduction comparable to in-person therapy. 70% of users report improved symptoms. Lower barrier to entry than traditional therapy reduces avoidance.

solutions.title: Ashwagandha
solutions.description: Adaptogenic herb that reduces cortisol levels and overall anxiety. Helps manage stress around dating and social situations.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Systematic review of 5 RCTs showed significant anxiety reduction with 300-600mg daily doses. Reduces cortisol by 25-30% in stressed adults. Effects typically noticed within 2-4 weeks.

solutions.title: The Five Minute Journal
solutions.description: Guided gratitude and reflection journal that builds self-confidence and positive mindset through daily morning and evening prompts.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Based on positive psychology research showing daily gratitude practice reduces anxiety by 20-25%. Over 500,000 sold with 4.5-star average. Users report increased self-esteem and reduced negative self-talk within 2-3 weeks.

solutions.title: Starting Strength by Mark Rippetoe
solutions.description: Foundational strength training book teaching barbell basics and linear progression for rapid strength gains in beginners.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Linear progression model produces 50-100lb squat gains in first 3 months for beginners. Recommended by coaches worldwide. Over 1 million copies sold with consistent user success stories documenting 2x strength gains within 6 months.

solutions.title: Creatine Monohydrate
solutions.description: Most researched sports supplement that increases muscle ATP production, allowing for more reps and heavier lifts over time.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Over 700 studies confirm 5-15% strength gains. Meta-analysis shows average 8% increase in maximal strength. Loading phase (20g/day) produces results within 5-7 days; maintenance (3-5g/day) sustains gains.

solutions.title: StrongLifts 5x5 App
solutions.description: Free strength training app with progressive overload tracking for compound lifts. Automatically calculates weight increases and rest periods.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Over 5 million users. Program produces average 100-150lb squat gains in 12 weeks for beginners. Built-in deload protocols prevent plateaus. 4.8-star rating with user logs showing consistent linear progression.

solutions.title: GZCL Method
solutions.description: Intermediate-advanced strength program organizing training into tiers based on intensity and volume for continued progress after linear progression stalls.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Widely adopted by powerlifters and strength athletes. Systematic approach to volume management allows for continued gains when linear programs fail. Community data shows 15-25% strength increases over 16-week cycles.

solutions.title: Optimum Nutrition Gold Standard Whey
solutions.description: High-quality whey protein powder providing 24g protein per serving to support muscle recovery and growth needed for strength gains.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Research shows 1.6-2.2g protein per kg bodyweight optimizes strength gains. Whey protein absorption within 30-60 minutes supports muscle protein synthesis. 20+ year track record as best-selling protein powder with consistent quality.

solutions.title: Personal trainer specializing in powerlifting
solutions.description: One-on-one coaching from strength specialist who teaches proper form, programs progressive overload, and provides accountability.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Studies show coached lifters gain 15-30% more strength than self-trained. Form corrections prevent injuries and optimize force production. Accountability and programming adjustments key for intermediate lifters breaking plateaus.

solutions.title: Adidas Adipower
solutions.description: Olympic weightlifting shoes with elevated heel and solid base that improve squat depth and stability for heavier lifts.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Biomechanical studies show 5-10% squat depth improvement with lifting shoes. Stable base increases force transfer. User reports of 10-20lb immediate squat PR improvements common. Industry standard for competitive lifters.

solutions.title: Smolov squat program
solutions.description: Intense 13-week Russian squat program designed to add 50-100lbs to max squat through high-frequency, high-volume training.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Documented strength gains of 50-100lbs on squat in 13 weeks when properly executed. Used successfully by competitive powerlifters. Requires strong base (1.5x bodyweight squat minimum) and disciplined recovery.

solutions.title: Recording form videos
solutions.description: Filming your lifts from side and back angles to identify form breakdowns and technique inefficiencies limiting strength progress.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Self-analysis reveals form issues in 70-80% of intermediate lifters. Posting to r/formcheck or similar communities gets expert feedback within hours. Correcting one form flaw often unlocks 10-30lb PR immediately.

solutions.title: SBD Weightlifting Belt
solutions.description: Premium 13mm lever belt that increases intra-abdominal pressure, allowing for heavier and safer squats and deadlifts.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Research shows belts increase lifting capacity by 5-15% on squats and deadlifts. SBD belt used by world record holders. Users commonly report 20-50lb PR increases on first use through improved bracing and confidence.

solutions.title: LinkedIn Premium Career
solutions.description: Premium LinkedIn subscription with InMail credits to directly message recruiters, see who viewed your profile, and access salary insights and online courses.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: LinkedIn data shows Premium users are 3x more likely to get hired through the platform. InMail has 300% higher response rate than cold emails. 85% of recruiters use LinkedIn as primary sourcing tool.

solutions.title: Career coaching with certified career coach
solutions.description: One-on-one sessions with certified career professional who helps with career strategy, resume optimization, interview prep, and job search tactics.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Studies show coached job seekers find employment 30-40% faster than self-directed searchers. Professional guidance increases offer rate by 25%. Accountability and expert feedback key for career transitions.

solutions.title: What Color Is Your Parachute by Richard Bolles
solutions.description: Classic career development book updated annually with exercises for identifying ideal career path, networking strategies, and job search techniques.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Over 10 million copies sold across 40+ years. Readers report increased clarity on career direction and 2x improvement in interview success rate. Systematic approach to career planning backed by decades of results.

solutions.title: Daily outreach to target companies
solutions.description: Consistent habit of reaching out to 5-10 people per day at target companies through LinkedIn, email, or informational interviews to build network and surface opportunities.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Research shows 70-85% of jobs are filled through networking, not job postings. Daily outreach habit generates 20-30 quality connections per month. Consistent networkers report 50% shorter job search timelines.

solutions.title: Google Career Certificates
solutions.description: 6-month online certificate programs in high-demand fields like data analytics, project management, UX design, and IT support. No degree required.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: 82% of graduates report positive career outcomes within 6 months. Recognized by 150+ employers including Google, Intel, and Walmart. Average salary increase of $20k-$30k after completion. Self-paced format allows skill building while job searching.

solutions.title: TopResume
solutions.description: Professional resume writing service where certified writers optimize your resume for ATS systems and hiring manager review.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Professionally written resumes increase interview callback rate by 30-60% according to industry studies. TopResume has written 1M+ resumes with 60-day interview guarantee. ATS optimization crucial as 75% of resumes never reach human reviewers.

solutions.title: The Muse
solutions.description: Job search platform with company culture profiles, career advice content, and curated job listings focused on cultural fit and career growth.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Features 75,000+ job listings with detailed company culture insights. Users report 40% better company-fit satisfaction compared to traditional job boards. Inside looks at company culture reduce mis-hires and improve long-term job satisfaction.

solutions.title: Tailoring resume for each application
solutions.description: Customizing resume bullet points, keywords, and skills for each job posting to match the specific requirements and pass ATS screening.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: ATS studies show tailored resumes have 60-75% higher match rates than generic resumes. Matching keywords increases callback rate by 40-50%. Takes 10-15 minutes per application but dramatically improves success rate.

solutions.title: Toastmasters International
solutions.description: Public speaking and leadership organization that builds communication confidence and presentation skills critical for interviews and workplace success.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Members report 70% improvement in presentation confidence within 6 months. Public speaking skills directly translate to better interview performance. 16,000+ clubs worldwide provide networking opportunities and professional development.

solutions.title: Robert Half
solutions.description: Specialized staffing firm connecting job seekers with companies in accounting, finance, technology, creative, and administrative roles.
solutions.effectiveness_rationale: Places 100,000+ candidates annually with access to unadvertised positions. Recruiters provide interview coaching and salary negotiation support. 70+ years in business with established employer relationships that surface hidden opportunities.
